jobTitle: Remote Sales Rep - No Exp Needed, Full Training, Flexible Schedule
description:
Job Description

Are you seeking more time, more income, more freedom?? Sales is definitely the gateway to controlling you own life. Not everyone "believes" they would be good at sales, even though SALES IS EVERYTHING EVERYWHERE ALL THE TIME.

Perks:

  • Enjoy the freedom of working remotely from anywhere.
  • Tailor your schedule with flexible hours that complement your lifestyle.
  • Receive comprehensive training and continuous support.
  • Bid farewell to cold calling with our innovative system.
  • Experience unlimited earning potential with uncapped commission-only opportunity and regular bonuses.

Responsibilities:

  • Engage with potential customers by responding to inbound requests.
  • Schedule virtual appointments and connect with clients online.
  • Customize quotes (life solutions, retirement solutions, legal services, tax services, loan services, real estate) to meet individual needs.
  • Guide clients through seamless application processes.
  • As a 1099 independent contractor, candidates may have the opportunity to represent other products and services as they become available, should they choose to.

Qualifications:

  • Demonstrate resourcefulness in problem-solving.
  • Exhibit dedication to achieving success.
  • Maintain professionalism in all interactions.

United States Candidates Only. Results may vary depending on various factors. Apply with your resume - we will reach out to you with interview availability.

By clicking 'Apply Now' and checking the box in the screening question, I consent to be contacted by KGF powered by RSR and AJF, plus its partners via live agent, artificial or AI-generated voice calls, robocalls, prerecorded voice messages, email, and automated SMS text at my residential or cellular number, dialed manually or by autodialer, solely for the purpose of processing my application for this position.

Company Description

We are a one stop shop for training, growing, and empowering remote sales professionals in multiple industries. This is done so candidates can maximize income in minimal time.
